edu.gvsu.cis.spacejourney.entity

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
      • edu.gvsu.cis.spacejourney.entity.Entity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable, Collidable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enemy, PlayerSpaceship, Projectile

    public abstract class Entity
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
implements Collidable, com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Abstract class that designs a template for creating any type of entity. These entities are meant to be have created bodies in a Box2D world.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Entity(com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage stage)
      Creates a textureless entity, and sets the state to be used for future reference.
      Entity(com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage stage, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion textureRegion)
      Creates an entity using a desired texture to attach to a Box2D body.

      • Entity

        public Entity(com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage stage,
              com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion textureRegion)
        Creates an entity using a desired texture to attach to a Box2D body.
        Parameters:
        stage - current stage that updates actors.
        textureRegion - texture to bind to the Box2D.

        public boolean outOfBounds()
        Method that checks if the current actor is out of the screen's bounds.
